## fromBuffer() function

Executes a Deconstructor on a Buffer, and returns its result

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function fromBuffer<T>(deconstructor: Deconstructor<T>, input: InputBuffer, offset?: number): Deconstruction<T>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deconstructor | <code>Deconstructor&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |
|  input | <code>InputBuffer</code> |  |
|  offset | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Deconstruction<T>`
